There you are... just in time!: Look, here it comes!
你來得正好！: 瞧，它來了！

There you are... just in time!: Marcello's Balloon Rentals at your service!
你來得正好！: 馬切羅出租熱氣球很高興為您服務！

There you are... just in time!: Marcello: It's all yours for two hours.
你來得正好！: 馬切羅：您可使用兩小時。

There you are... just in time!: Marcello: Now... I was told there's a saloon somewhere around here?
你來得正好！: 馬切羅：那……我聽說這附近有間酒吧？

There you are... just in time!: I saw an ad in the paper for these balloon rides and I knew I had to surprise you with one.
你來得正好！: 我在報紙上看到搭乘熱氣球的廣告，我就知道可以給你一個驚喜。

There you are... just in time!: This looks fun! Let's ride!
你來得正好！: 好有趣的樣子啊！我們坐坐吧！

There you are... just in time!: ...But aren't you afraid of heights?
你來得正好！: 但你不是怕高嗎？

There you are... just in time!: Okay... you first.
你來得正好！: 好吧……你先請。

There you are... just in time!: We... We're up so high... *gulp*
你來得正好！: 好……好高啊……（吞口水）

There you are... just in time!: I wanted to impress you with this... but look at me. I'm a trembling coward.
你來得正好！: 我本想用這個來打動你……但被你看到我嚇成這個樣子。我真是個膽小鬼。

There you are... just in time!: Well, you've got more than enough courage to make up for me, @... that's... that's part of why I like you.
你來得正好！: 嗯，你的勇氣十足，這正能彌補我的不足，@……那……那就是我喜歡你的原因之一。

There you are... just in time!: Okay, I'm going to open my eyes and look down... don't let go of my hand.
你來得正好！: 好的，我正準備睜開眼睛並往下看……不要放開我的手。

There you are... just in time!: I... I think I can do it now.
你來得正好！: 我……現在應該可以了。

There you are... just in time!: Hey, this is incredible! I think I can see Mayor Lewis standing in the town square!
你來得正好！: 嘿，這真是太棒了！搞不好我看得到路易斯鎮長站在廣場上！

There you are... just in time!: Oh dear... our time's almost up.
你來得正好！: 天啊……時間快到了。

There you are... just in time!: Um... @? We've known each other for a while now and... I... er...
你來得正好！: 呃……@？我們已經認識一段時間了……我……呃……

There you are... just in time!: Whoops... Our time was up half an hour ago. We'd better touch down.
你來得正好！: 噢不……我們只剩下半小時了。我們最好趕緊落地。

There you are... just in time!: I haven't had such a wonderful day for as long as I can remember.
你來得正好！: 我好久沒玩得這麼開心了。

There you are... just in time!: I am... yeah.
你來得正好！: 是……沒錯。

There you are... just in time!: But I'm determined to not let that stop me from doing what I want... and experiencing this with you.
你來得正好！: 但我已經下定決心，不能讓它阻礙我的夢想……還有陪在你身邊的機會。

There you are... just in time!: I'll try not to get scared.

There you are... just in time!: Ah... @. I've been waiting for you.
你來得正好！: 呃……@。我在等你。

There you are... just in time!: Have I ever told you I used to be married?
你來得正好！: 我有告訴過你我過去曾結過婚嗎？

There you are... just in time!: Strange, I know... for a man like me. But it's true.
你來得正好！: 作為一個像我這樣的男人，我知道這很奇怪……但這是事實。

There you are... just in time!: My wife and I were together for many years, until... until I made a mistake that drove her away.
你來得正好！: 我和我前妻一起生活了很多年，直……直到我犯了一個錯誤導致她離開了。

There you are... just in time!: Her anger and envy were so intense that she turned green and began flying around the countryside, cursing everything in her path...
你來得正好！: 她的憤怒和嫉妒是如此強烈，以至於她全身變成綠色，開始在鄉村周圍飛行，詛咒著她在路上遭遇的一切……

There you are... just in time!: When I found out, I sealed this passage to her home... fearing that an innocent villager might fall prey to her dark magic.
你來得正好！: 當我發現時，我把通往她家的道路封印了……我擔心會有無辜的村民成為她黑魔法的犧牲品。

There you are... just in time!: But now, it must be unsealed... for when we separated, she took my magic ink!
你來得正好！: 但現在，必須把封印解開……因為我們分離的時候，她拿走了我的魔法藥水！

There you are... just in time!: I need that magic ink back!
你來得正好！: 我需要拿回那藥水！

There you are... just in time!: I would do this myself, but I... I can't see her again. That's why I need your help.
你來得正好！: 我本來是想透過自己來完成的，但我……我再也不能看見她。所以我才需要你的幫忙。

There you are... just in time!: In order to unseal this passage, you'll need a dark talisman. Talk to Krobus, in the sewer... he should know where to find one.
你來得正好！: 為了解封這條通道，你需要暗黑護符。與下水道的柯洛布斯交談，他應該知道在哪能得到。

There you are... just in time!: I'm counting on you... if you can retrieve my magic ink I promise I'll make it worth your while... Now go!
你來得正好！: 我全指望你了……如果你能取回我的魔法藥水，我保證不會虧待你的。……現在趕緊出發吧！
